sentences.en: An abridgement of the book has been published for young readers.
sentences.cn: 他们为年轻读者出版了这本书的节本.

sentences.en: Beginners are encouraged to read abridgement of David Copperfield because the original is too difficult.
sentences.cn: 要鼓励初学者去读《大卫·科波菲尔》的缩写本,因为原著太难了.

sentences.en: He read abridgement of the long novel.
sentences.cn: 他读了那部长“篇”小说的节本.

sentences.en: He read an abridgement of the long novel.
sentences.cn: 他读了那部长篇小说的节本.

sentences.en: In conclusion, the author puts forward three translation strategies, namely, abridgement, adaptation and interpretation.
sentences.cn: 在结论部分作者提出了三种翻译策略, 即删减法、改译法和解释法.

sentences.en: The town council voted for an abridgement of the mayor's power.
sentences.cn: 市议会投票赞成限制市长的权力.

words.tran_cn: 删节；删节本；[图情] 文摘；缩短；限制
缩短；减少；删去（abridge的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 节本，缩减，节略，（权利、特权、自由等的）剥夺
